response.original_title: The Nose Knows: Foreignness and Fortune in China
response.overview: Throughout history, the shape of a nose has carried social and political meaning in China, marking differences between locals and outsiders. Today, those same features can influence identity, opportunity, and even personal destiny. This film explores how something as small as a nose can reveal how China sees itself and its evolving place in the world.
response.title: The Nose Knows: Foreignness and Fortune in China
